entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -43.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -43.6°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -48.5°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 39.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
